tool_description: Access 350,000+ recipes, reviews and nutrition facts.
name: BigOven
title: BigOven

api_list.name: addRecipeImage
api_list.description: Add recipe image.

api_list.name: addRecipeToGroceryList
api_list.description: Add a Recipe to the grocery list.

required_parameters.name: markAsPending
required_parameters.description: Indicate that the lines in the recipe should be marked in a "pending" (unconfirmed by user) state.

required_parameters.name: scale
required_parameters.description: Scale=1.0 says to keep the recipe the same size as originally posted.

api_list.name: addReplyToReview
api_list.description: POST a reply to a given review. The date will be set by server. Note that replies no longer have star ratings, only top-level reviews do.

api_list.name: addSingleItemToGroceryList
api_list.description: Add a single line item to the grocery list.

api_list.name: createRecipe
api_list.description: Add a new recipe.

api_list.name: createRecipeFeedback
api_list.description: Feedback on a Recipe -- for internal BigOven editors.

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: The payload for feedback, which includes the field "feedback".

api_list.name: createRecipeNote
api_list.description: Create a new note into the system.

required_parameters.name: recipeNoteGUID
required_parameters.description: Recipe note grocery list item id.

api_list.name: createReview
api_list.description: Add a new review. Only one review can be provided per {userId, recipeId} pair. Otherwise your review will be updated.

api_list.name: deleteItemFromGroceryList
api_list.description: Will delete this item assuming you own it.

api_list.name: deleteItemsFromGroceryList
api_list.description: Delete all the items on a grocery list; faster operation than a sync with deleted items.

api_list.name: deleteMyReviewReply
api_list.description: DELETE a reply to a given review. Authenticated user must be the one who originally posted the reply.

api_list.name: deleteMySingleRecipe
api_list.description: Delete user single recipe.

api_list.name: deleteRecipeNote
api_list.description: Delete recipe note.

api_list.name: departmentalizeItemsInGroceryList
api_list.description: Departmentalize a list of strings. Used for ad-hoc grocery list item addition.

api_list.name: getFoodGlossaryArticleByTerm
api_list.description: Get food glossary article by term (e.g., asparagus). This editorial is (c) BigOven and MUST carry attribution and a link back to the glossary entry on BigOven.com.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: Keyword used to look up article, e.g., asparagus.

api_list.name: getFoodGlossaryArticle
api_list.description: Get food glossary article.

api_list.name: getMyGroceryList
api_list.description: Get the user's grocery list. User is determined by Basic Authentication.

api_list.name: getMyRecipeReview
api_list.description: Get *my* review for the recipe {recipeId}, where "me" is determined by standard authentication headers

api_list.name: getMySingleRecipe
api_list.description: Get user single recipe.

api_list.name: getMySingleRecipeNote
api_list.description: GET /recipe/{recipeId}/note/{noteId}

required_parameters.name: noteId
required_parameters.description: The note ID (note -- it's not the RecipeID).

api_list.name: getRandomRecipe
api_list.description: Get a random, home-page-quality Recipe.

api_list.name: getRecipeAutocomplete
api_list.description: Given a query, return recipe titles starting with query. Query must be at least 3 chars in length.

api_list.name: getRecipeCategories
api_list.description: Get a list of recipe categories.

api_list.name: getRecipeCollectionMetadata
api_list.description: Gets a recipe collection metadata. A recipe collection is a curated set of recipes.

api_list.name: getRecipeCollections
api_list.description: Get the list of current, seasonal recipe collections. From here, you can use the /collection/{id} endpoint to retrieve the recipes in those collections.

api_list.name: getRecipeNotes
api_list.description: Get recipe notes.

api_list.name: getRecipePhotos
api_list.description: Get all the photos for a recipe

api_list.name: getRecipeRaves
api_list.description: Get the recipe/comment tuples for those recipes with 4 or 5 star ratings.

api_list.name: getRecipeReviews
api_list.description: Get paged list of reviews for a recipe. Each review will have at most one FeaturedReply, as well as a ReplyCount.

api_list.name: getRecipeScanImages
api_list.description: Gets a list of RecipeScan images for the recipe. There will be at most 3 per recipe.

api_list.name: getRelatedRecipes
api_list.description: Get recipes related to the given recipeId.

api_list.name: getReviewReplies
api_list.description: Get a paged list of replies for a given review.

api_list.name: getSingleRecipeCollection
api_list.description: Gets a recipe collection. A recipe collection is a curated set of recipes.

api_list.name: getSingleReview
api_list.description: Get a given review by string-style ID. This will return a payload with FeaturedReply, ReplyCount. Recommended display is to list top-level reviews with one featured reply underneath. Currently, the FeaturedReply is the most recent one for that rating.

api_list.name: getUserRecentlyViewedRecipes
api_list.description: Get a list of recipes that the authenticated user has most recently viewed.

api_list.name: searchRecipes
api_list.description: Search for recipes. There are many parameters that you can apply.

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Optionally set to either "myrecipes", "try", "favorites","added" to filter to just the authenticated user's recipe set.

optional_parameters.name: folder
optional_parameters.description: Search in a specific folder name for the authenticated user.

optional_parameters.name: containsPasta
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, recipe contains pasta, set to 0 means contains no pasta (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: cuisine
optional_parameters.description: Limit to a specific cuisine. Cooks can enter anything free-form, but the few dozen preconfigured values are Afghan,African,American,American-South,Asian,Australian,Brazilian,Cajun,Canadian,Caribbean,Chinese,Croatian,Cuban,Dessert,Eastern European,English,French,German,Greek,Hawaiian,Hungarian,India,Indian,Irish,Italian,Japanese,Jewish,Korean,Latin,Mediterranean,Mexican,Middle Eastern,Moroccan,Polish,Russian,Scandanavian,Seafood,Southern,Southwestern,Spanish,Tex-Mex,Thai,Vegan,Vegetarian,Vietnamese.

optional_parameters.name: includeIngredients
optional_parameters.description: A CSV representing up to 3 ingredients to include, e.g., tomatoes,corn%20%starch,chicken.

optional_parameters.name: userId
optional_parameters.description: Set the target userid to search their public recipes.

optional_parameters.name: shellfishFree
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, limit to shellfish-free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: dairyFree
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, limit to dairy-free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: whiteMeatFree
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, limit to white-meat free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: glutenFree
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, limit to gluten-free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: userset
optional_parameters.description: If set to a given username, it'll force the search to filter to just that username.

optional_parameters.name: excludeCategoryId
optional_parameters.description: Like include_cat, set this to an integer to exclude a specific category.

optional_parameters.name: vegan
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, limit to vegan (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: boostmine
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, boost my own recipes in my folders so they show up high in the list (at the expense of other sort orders).

optional_parameters.name: vegetarian
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, limit to vegetarian (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: containsCheese
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, limit to contains-cheese (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: collectionId
optional_parameters.description: Limit to a collection ID number.

optional_parameters.name: photos
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, limit search results to photos only.

optional_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
optional_parameters.description: A CSV representing up to 3 ingredients to exclude  (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: username
optional_parameters.description: Set the target username to search their public recipes.

optional_parameters.name: searchInTitleByKeyword
optional_parameters.description: Search just in the recipe title for the keyword.

optional_parameters.name: includeCategoryId
optional_parameters.description: Integer of the subcategory you'd like to limit searches to (see the /recipe/categories endpoint for available id numbers). For instance, 58 is "Main Dish > Casseroles".

optional_parameters.name: searchAnywhereByKeyword
optional_parameters.description: Search anywhere in the recipe for the keyword.

optional_parameters.name: includePrimaryCat
optional_parameters.description: Csv indicating up to three top-level categories -- valid values are [appetizers,bread,breakfast,desserts,drinks,maindish,salads,sidedish,soups,marinades,other].

optional_parameters.name: treeNutFree
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, limit to tree-nut free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: seaFoodFree
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, limit to seafood-free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: nutFree
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, limit to nut-free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

optional_parameters.name: redMeatFree
optional_parameters.description: When set to 1, limit to red-meat free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

api_list.name: synchronizeGroceryList
api_list.description: Synchronize the grocery list.

required_parameters.name: requisiteItems
required_parameters.description: Array of JSON objects, grocery list items.

required_parameters.name: requisiteRecipes
required_parameters.description: Array of JSON objects, grocery list recipes.

api_list.name: updateGroceryItem
api_list.description: Update a grocery item by GUID

api_list.name: updateMyReviewReply
api_list.description: Update (PUT) a reply to a given review. Authenticated user must be the original one that posted the reply.

api_list.name: updateRecipe
api_list.description: Update a recipe.

required_parameters.name: ingredients
required_parameters.description: Array of JSON objects, recipe ingredients.

api_list.name: updateRecipeNote
api_list.description: Update a Recipe note (RecipeNote).

optional_parameters.name: recipeNoteGUID
optional_parameters.description: Recipe note grocery list item id.

api_list.name: updateReview
api_list.description: Update a given top-level review.
